Series.Actors: |Dylan McDermott|Connie Britton|Jessica Lange|Alex Breckenridge|Frances Conroy|Zachary Quinto|Evan Peters|Denis O'Hare|Taissa Farmiga|
Series.Overview: The series centers on the Harmon family: Ben, Vivien and their daughter Violet, who move from Boston to Los Angeles after Vivien has a miscarriage and Ben has an affair. They move into a restored mansion, unaware that the home is haunted by its former inhabitants.
